me chithrapata dakma pawathwa aththe ewakata kolambaa chayarupa shilpiyeku wu ee.dabliw.andru wisini.1880 wasare merata arambai amechar fotografik sosayiti samajikayaku wana andru sathuwa kolambaa yuniyan pedese anka 40 darana thana hoptan studiyo namin chayarupagarayak da wiya.andru ge chayarupa kalawa haraha ath poth thabuwaku wanuye wisi wana siyawase merata kalawan udesa wishishta sewawak kala layanal wendt ya.(andru pilibada thawath thorathuru mathu balaporoththuwanna) boyarwarun wisin merata ta ithiri kala sesu dayadayanatharin ekak wanuye henri engalbresht pilibanda purawruththanthayayi.sesu boyarwarun men engalanthaye kondesi sahitha samawa piliganmata akamathi wu engalbresht hambanthota ta wi dukkhitha wa kalaya gatha kaleya.pasu kalaka yala wanodyanaye mulma palakawaraya da wuye engalbreshtya.
